text:
"Combat Baby" was also a single in the UK.
Track listing.
All tracks written by Metric.
Official samples.
Metric's official website has short clips of this album on their [http://www.ilovemetric.com/music.html music page].
Lyrics.
Lyrics for this album can be found on [http://www.ilovemetric.com/music-oldworldunderground-lyrics.html Metric's website].
